DOC.brief_title: The Influence Energy Drinks Blood Oxygenation Concentration Optic Nerve
DOC.detailed_description: The blood oxygenation assess use machine call OSOME . The online spectroreflectometry oxygenation measurement eye ( OSOME ) use measure eye fundus oxygenation , precisely optic nerve head capillary structure oxygenation , full spectrum reflectometry ( 1020 wavelength 400 700nm ) real time ( O.S.O.M.E. , Faubert & Diaconu US patent # 5,919,132 ) 2 % accuracy . It include fundus camera ( Topcon , Osaka , Japan ) couple digital video camera ( USB ) detection unit compose multi-channel spectrograph charge couple device ( CCD ) . In order use machine , upon arrival , patient 's right eye need dilate drop proparacaine hydrochloride 0.5 % , tropicamide 1 % phenylephrine hydrochloride 2.5 % . The patient require rest 20 minute allow complete dilatation pupil use OSOME .
DOC.criteria: Be man woman good general health Be nonsmoker Weigh 45 kg 80 kg Have intra ocular pressure inferior 22 mm Hg Have blood pressure inferior 120/80 mm Hg Absence systemic disease ( include hypertension , diabetes , vascular disease ) , Absence ocular disease Evidence abstinence caffeine caffeine beverages 48 hour prior experiment Abstinence use systemic drug and/or alcohol Any subject family personal history glaucoma exclude All subject n't respect inclusion criterion There monetary compensation participate study .
